## Favorite equation

Posterior distribution: 
$$
p(\text{parameters} \mid \text{data}) = \frac{f(\text{data} \mid \text{parameters}) \, p(\text{parameters})}{f(\text{data})}
$$

The probability distribution of the parameters, conditioning on the dataset.
